title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
In a pan, cook the pancetta until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk together the eggs, pecorino, and parmesan.
Drain the spaghetti and add it to the pan with pancetta.
Remove from heat and quickly mix in the egg mixture.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken in yogurt and tikka masala paste for at least 1 hour.
Grill the chicken until cooked through.
In a pan, sauté onion, garlic, and ginger until soft.
Add canned tomatoes and coconut milk, and simmer for 10 minutes.
Add the grilled chicken to the sauce and cook for another 5 minutes.
Garnish with fresh coriander and serve with rice or naan.

title: Beef Stroganoff
summary: A creamy and savory dish made with tender beef, mushrooms, and onions.
instructions: In a pan, brown the beef slices and set aside.
In the same pan, sauté onions and mushrooms until soft.
Sprinkle flour over the vegetables and stir well.
Gradually add beef broth, stirring until thickened.
Return the beef to the pan and stir in sour cream and mustard.
Season with salt and pepper, and garnish with parsley before serving.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A quick and healthy dish made with a variety of fresh vegetables and soy sauce.
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a pan over medium heat.
Add garlic and sauté for 1 minute.
Add all the vegetables and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes.
Pour in soy sauce and stir well to combine.
Season with salt and pepper, and garnish with sesame seeds before serving.

title: Shrimp Tacos
summary: Delicious tacos filled with seasoned shrimp, fresh vegetables, and a zesty sauce.
instructions: In a bowl, toss the shrimp with olive oil, chili powder, cumin, salt, and pepper.
Heat a skillet over medium heat and cook the shrimp for 2-3 minutes on each side until pink and cooked through.
Warm the corn tortillas in a separate pan or microwave.
Assemble the tacos by placing shrimp on each tortilla, topped with shredded cabbage and avocado slices.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve with lime wedges.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
summary: Classic homemade cookies loaded with chocolate chips, perfect for any occasion.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
In a bowl, whisk together flour, baking soda, and salt.
In another bowl, cream together the butter, brown sugar, and granulated sugar until smooth.
Beat in the vanilla extract and egg until well combined.
Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients and mix until just combined.
Fold in the chocolate chips.
Drop spoonfuls of dough onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
Bake for 10-12 minutes or until the edges are golden brown.
Let cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring to a wire rack.
